content:
## n8n@0.74.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.73.1...n8n@0.74.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-07-15 - New nodes - Hacker News - QuestDB - Xero - Enhanced nodes - Affinity Trigger - HTTP Request - Mailchimp - MongoDB - Pipedrive - Postgres - UpLead - Webhook - Webhook URLs are now handled independently of the workflow ID by `https://{hostname}/webhook/{path}` instead of the older `https://{hostname}/webhook/{workflow_id}/{node_name}/{path}`.
